name: Suffocation
description:
Suffocation is a game about a man. It will deal with heavy stuff, but it is mostly about writers block and vivid nightmares/insomnia.  Every ending I am hoping to provide a clear message of some kind. This is a INCOMPLETE GAME created with Twine.  There will be MAJOR updates and the main premise of this will probably have major changes. It is very short because currently I am just trying to see if I can finish A Thing.

Idea for the number of endings? Currently 4.

NOTE: I’ve been doing my own proof reading. I got someone to help me out when I actually complete it.
